45 46 47 48 49  8  7
44 00 22 00 20 00  6
43 00 00 00 00 00  5
42 00 00 00 00 00  4
41 00 00 00 00 00  3
40 00 32 00 16 00  2
39 38 37 36 15 14  1

Solution:
45 46 47 48 49  8  7 
44 23 22 21 20  9  6 
43 24 25 26 19 10  5 
42 29 28 27 18 11  4 
41 30 33 34 17 12  3 
40 31 32 35 16 13  2 
39 38 37 36 15 14  1
